title: Breakingviews TV: The World Cup
text:
Breakingviews TV: The World Cup 6:37am BST - 04:34
Spoiler: Germany wins. So says the Breakingviews interactive graphic that screens the 32 countries’ soccer teams against various criteria to decide who’s strongest. Peter Thal Larsen explains how it works, and why Costa Rica might still have an outside chance. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
